column4: - Fundamental change: cell_x is longitude, cell_y is latitude, x axis for latitude, z axis for longitude. - New, simpler, efficient but less accurate approach to calculate coordinates, using degree length.
Merge branch 'dev' of https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js into dev
Merge branch 'dev' of https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js into dev
- Integrated map scaling feature with some issue: unable to translate or precision loss at higher scale.
Merge branch 'dev' of https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js into dev
- Added New menu for map manipulation - Merge similar function into one (more performance) - for OSM map layer automatically update the map coordinates when scaled (concept prooven)
Merge branch 'dev' of https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js into dev
- Add more options to manipulate the map due to incompatibility between CSS3D and WebGL
Merge branch 'dev' of https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js into dev
- Resolve map quality loss issue" using CSS3D"
Merge branch 'dev' of https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js into dev
- Fixed grid scale issue - map with correct size
Merge branch 'dev' of https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js into dev
- Fix proportion issue - Clean up codes - New map layer in SVG format and in correct size
- Test with real data - Fix projection issue: data are now projected proportionally within the 100x100x100 Cube. Values range are taken into consideration.
- Fix offset error where CUnit falls out of the grid - Resolve conflicts between filters.

- New colour code: blue - red gradient - Larger dataset with 1000 entries - FIx unproper display/projection due to miscalculation in proportion. - Fix issue where modifying one filter will break others - Add more filters: change CUnit geometry, one layer
- Added unit measure HUD - User can choose to project just a certain amount of cubes via time_step filter
- Remove GUI.js - Centralize all UI elements in one control panel - Integrate Bootstrap and jQuery into the framework.
- Implemented Camera System:     + Adjust label automatically base on camera view     + Control panel collapsible (bootstrap)
- Restructure the project - New type of Camera: CombinedCamera to have both Perspective and Orthogonal functionalities - Added zoom function for CombinedCamera
- Added labels for each axis (longitude, latitude, time_step) - each CUnit can be picked: it would be highlighted and a its information will be shown.
Added a slider that allow to see data from certain time_step
- with sample dataset, build a small demo
